segments.text: That boy is going to fall off that stool any second now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see him reaching for the cookie jar like it’s the most important thing in the world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister is just standing there, waiting for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Neither of them seems to notice how dangerous this is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool legs are splayed out, and he’s stretching too far.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he doesn’t pull the whole cabinet down with him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl looks so innocent, just holding out her hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But she’s part of this too, encouraging him to take risks.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if their mother would even notice if he fell.
segments.speaker: PAR
